982480.name: Supreme Casino City
982480.description:
Let’s make your casino value up and enjoy it !

▶️ The Features of Supreme Casino City
• There is no time to be bored every time when you play 365 days a year ! Make your casino profit better through upgrading your casino !
• You can level your staff up for free whenever you upgrade your casino. As your staff level-up, your casino profits will be increased.
• Experience Full-3D casino. Enjoy various slots machines and get a chance to win a jackpot.
• Show off the spirit of veritable adventurer through Baccarat.
• There will be your luck in Dice game. Take your luck in Dice game right now !!
• Bet and win in Roulette. There will be 35 times of luck with you.
• Not enough coins? Don’t worry about it!!
Lucky Spin is ready every 8 hours, and the rewards is bigger as your casino value.
• Share fun things with your friends by participation in Facebook Likes event.
You can get various rewards as the number of “Likes”
• Challenge a ranking tournament !! The ranking tournament will give you various rewards and joy.

* If download-error occurs, try log-in again after shutting down the app.
